lead_paragraph: The suicide attack, which killed more than 50, is the deadliest in a string of bombings in Turkey as the war in Syria spills over the border.

byline.original: By TIM ARANGO and CEYLAN YEGINSU

headline.print_headline: In Turkey, Child Turns Wedding Into Blood Bath
headline.main: Syria’s Horrors Visit Turkey Again as Bomber Attacks Kurdish Wedding

snippet: The suicide attack, which killed more than 50, is the deadliest in a string of bombings in Turkey as the war in Syria spills over the border....
abstract: Suicide bombing by boy as young as 14 years old at Kurdish wedding in Gaziantep, Turkey, is deadliest in string of terrorist bombings in 2016, having claimed over 50 lives; Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan has blamed Islamic State group; bombing illustrates how Turkish interests in Syrian war, and its antagonism toward Pres Bashar al-Assad's government, Islamic State and Kurds, sometimes overlap.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
